attributes.additional_details: With regard to all future foreign aid.   No payment of money or funds should leave the UK.   Projects should be identified and contracts given to UK companies to supply the goods.  These could be for infrastucture such as water purification plants or power.   We could also supply construction or farming machinery.   No money for corrupt countries, just good machinery or bricks and mortar for the benefit of the people and our own industries and contruction companies.
